org.corfudb.client

Interface IServerProtocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorfuDBSimpleLogUnitProtocol, CorfuDBSimpleSequencerProtocol

    public interface IServerProtocol
    This interface represents the minimum APIs a server protocol must implement.
    Author:
    Michael Wei

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getFullString()
      Returns the full server string.
      static String getProtocolString()
      Returns the protocol string for this server protocol.
      boolean ping()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the server was reachable.
      static IServerProtocol protocolFactory(String host, String port, String fullString)
      Returns a new instance of this protocol, given a host, port and the server string.

    • Method Detail

      • getProtocolString

        static String getProtocolString()
        Returns the protocol string for this server protocol. For example, the protocol string for the hypertext transport protocol is "http".

      • protocolFactory

        static IServerProtocol protocolFactory(String host,
                                       String port,
                                       String fullString)
        Returns a new instance of this protocol, given a host, port and the server string.
        Parameters:
        host - The address of the host.
        port - The port number the protocol is being serviced on, if applicable.
        fullstring - The full server string. This may contain special options, etc.

      • getFullString

        String getFullString()
        Returns the full server string.

      • ping

        boolean ping()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether or not the server was reachable.
